company.Description: 1) Arranging acquisition capital to acquire Cloud Peak's 50% joint venture interest in the Decker Coal Company; 2) Arranging acquisition capital to acquire Arch Coal Company's 38% investment in the Millennium Bulk Terminal; 3) Assist in the divestiture of Black Butte Coal Company 4) Other capital raising assignments Ambre might request assistance with
Retainer Info : 10K per month for 3 months, then 5K per month for next 6 months.
